metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20180 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in ansible module where credentials are disclosed in theconsole log by default and not protected by the security feature when usingthe bitbucket_pipeline_variable module. This flaw allows an attacker tosteal bitbucket_pipeline credentials. The highest threat from thisvulnerability is to confidentiality.

criterions.comment: ansible: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
